ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I m back. I ll be taking control of my chars. Drag Strip swoops to the ground, transforming into car mode. He fires three plasma blasts at Firearm, then

OOC: I'm back. I'll be taking control of my chars.

Drag Strip swoops to the ground, transforming into car mode.
He fires three plasma blasts at Firearm, then spins around 180 
degrees as Dead-End, who was following his lead and had already 
transformed into car mode, takes a jump off of him in an attempt to 
smash Firearm.



On 18 Feb 2001, at 12:35, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::The Protectrons/God Maximus/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
> Lynx/Orion/Vulois/Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::The Protectrons see that the battle was intensifying and that they had to 
> act::
> Chromedome: Protectrons, unite!
> ::They combine and form God Maximus, who looks for a target.  he fires 2 
> missles from one gun at Sun Crusher, 2 missles from another gun at Reflector, 
> and 2 from his last gun at Vehement(He has two shoulder cannons and a gun on 
> his head).
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca fires 2 charges at Wildrider::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet fires 15 shots from each gun and 2 tusk missles at Wildrider::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe dodges most of the shots, but some hit him. He fires 13 shots and 
> 1 missles at Beastbox, and 12 shots and 1 missle at Squawktalk::
> ~~~~~
> Vulois: Good, because i need all the help i can get. It seems that my friends 
> Battera and Dachande have forgotten about me... Do you want to hear my story 
> first, or should i listen to yours?
> ~~~~~
> Wheeljack: Alright then.
> ::He walks outside of the base, motioning for Composer to follow him::
>
